data.message: These bitches be crying about oh you lost your support and oh you lost my respect but they post the same shit on every post. They say shit like unfollowed or unliked but are just crying for attention. If you genuinely hate what he said then do us Stans all a favour and fuck off. You said what you'd do but are still here talking shit.

replies.message:
You mean the 7 million followers who’ve unfollowed since, and counting.

Others like myself who stick around but don’t plan on buying the album.

The supporters that can only give him 20k-100k likes a post.

Em clearly made a dumb career move.
He spoke his mind, he hates Trump and anyone associated with him. I don't blame him. At least he knows who his real fans are now.

Em is currently worth about 200 million dollars as of 2017...you think he cares about the money at this point? And followers? Lol ...its about sending a message and he did that loud and clear ...get over it
The dude is set for life financially lol...his true fans will still support him and that's all that matters to him
